name: tallacmedia
tag_list: interactive-marketing, affiliate-marketing, lead-generation, social-media, search-marketing, mobile-marketing, performance-marketing, technology-platforms, advertising
overview:
tallacmedia is a highly integrated technology and media company that owns and operates a proprietary set of advertising focused products, services and properties. Their core mission is to deliver measurable results to advertisers and publishers using pay-for-performance tools and media channels.

Each year they deliver millions of leads, customers and actions to our advertisers including: BestBuy, GameFly, Buy.com, JC Penny, Disney, Blockbuster, Netflix, ITT Technical Institute, Devry, USC, ADT, Brinks Home Security, Discover Card, Wyndam Resorts, SC Johnson and many more.

Founded in 2007 by proven industry veterans, they are a profitable and self-funded corporation based directly at the hub of interactive advertising technology innovation in Palo Alto, CA

milestones.description: Company launches Revsnapp.com, a virtual currency and payments platform.
